title.en: Master of Geographic Information Systems & Technologies
title.ru: Магистратура в направлении "Геоинформационные системы и технологии"
title.uz: Geoaxborot tizimlari va texnologiyalari yo'nalishida magistratura

title.en: Tutor of mathematics, physics and programming
title.ru: Репетитор по математике, физике и программированию
title.uz: Matematika, fizika va dasturlash bo'yicha repetitor

en: Established positive relationships with students, parents, fellow teachers, and school administrators.
Planned and implemented lessons utilising variety of teaching strategies to meet diverse student needs.
Collaborated with other staff members to plan and schedule lessons promoting learning and student engagement.
Monitored student progress through classwork, coursework, and project marking, providing constructive feedback and extra support to underperforming students.
Created wide range of teaching material to assist student learning, including presentations, visual aids, and worksheets.
Instilled confidence in students through positive feedback.
Used effective teaching methods to assist with student development, including collaborative learning, positive reinforcement, modelling and explicit instruction.
Interacted with children and promoted good behaviour through positive reinforcement methods.
Maintained trusting student relationships by providing both educational and emotional support to students when required.

en: Managing the activity of the agency
Coming up with new technologies and solutions and confirming it with CEO
Estimating the time needed for the development phase of the project and the price of the development
Engaging the suitable developers for the development phase of the project
Leading the developers during the development phase of the project

en: Maintaining the geoportal of Uzbekistan.
Presenting the geoportal to other people and countries
Conducting the conversations and exchanging experience with foreign specialists.
Leading the developers in the department of GIS
Consulting the developers who work on other projects which include the basic GIS
Created unified database architecture of administrative boundaries (regions, districts).
Developed the GIS system for planning crop planting.
Automated the generation of the Excel sheets for storing calculated data and preparing reports.
Participating and leading the development of an analogue of the Field Worker program.
Participating in the analysis of the country's lands for assessment of their productivity.
Participating in the development of AI model for identifying planted crops.
